bibl.title: The God Tutu at Kellis: On Two Stelae Found at Ismant el-Kharab in 2000.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The God Tutu. - A Stela from the Reign of Septimius Severus. - Tutu in Human Form at Ismant el-Kharab. - A Stela depicting Tutu as a Sphinx. - Tutu as a Sphinx or Lion-God elsewhere in Ismant el-Kharab. - The Nature of Tutu at Kellis. - References.

bibl.title: assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: KAPER Olaf E., The God Tutu at Kellis: On Two Stelae Found at Ismant el-Kharab in 2000.

Gillian E. BOWEN and Colin A. HOPE (Edd.), assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 14 (Oxford, 2003) pp. 311-321, 10 figg.

Introduction. - The God Tutu. - A Stela from the Reign of Septimius Severus. - Tutu in Human Form at Ismant el-Kharab. - A Stela depicting Tutu as a Sphinx. - Tutu as a Sphinx or Lion-God elsewhere in Ismant el-Kharab. - The Nature of Tutu at Kellis. - References.
